name: Banshee
description: The singing siren, known for attracting its victims through song. It has been known to single out its prey before making a killing blow
weaknesses: Banshees can sometimes be heard screaming with a parabolic microphone
strengths: Banshees will weaken their target before striking

name: Demon
description: Demons are the most aggressive ghost we've ever encountered. Known to attack without reason, they seem to enjoy the thrill of the hunt.
weaknesses: Demons fear the crucifix and will be less aggressive near one
strengths: Demons will initiate hunts more often than other ghosts

name: Deogen
description: Sometimes surrounded by an endless fog, Deogen have been eluding ghost hunters for years. These ghosts have been reported to find even the most hidden prey, before stalking them into exhaustion.
weaknesses: Deogen require a lot of energy to form and will move very slowly when approaching its victim.
strengths: Deogen constantly sense the living. You can run but you can't hide.

name: Goryo
description: When a Goryo passes through a DOTS projector, using a video camera is the only way to see it.
weaknesses: They are rarely seen far from their place of death
strengths: A Goryo will usually only show itself on camera if are no people nearby

name: Hantu
description: A Hantu is a rare ghost that thrives in the coldest climates. The cold seems to make them more aggressive and empowered.
weaknesses: Hantus move slower in warmer areas
strengths: Lower temperatures allow the Hantu to move at faster speeds

name: Jinn
description: A Jinn is a territorial Ghost that will attack when threatened. It also has been known to travel at significant speed.
weaknesses: Turning off the location's power source will prevent the Jinn from using its ability
strengths: A Jinn will travel at a faster speed if its victim is far away

name: Mare
description: A Mare is the source of all nightmares, making it most powerful in the dark.
weaknesses: Turning the lights on around the Mare will lower its chance to attack
strengths: A Mare will have an increased chance to attack in the dark

name: Moroi
description: Moroi have risen from the grave to drain energy from the living. They have been known to place curses on their victims, curable only by antidotes or moving very far away.
weaknesses: Moroi suffer from hyperosmia, weakening them for longer periods.
strengths: The weaker their victims, the stronger the Moroi becomes.

name: Myling
description: A Myling is a very vocal and active ghost. They are rumoured to be quiet when hunting their prey.
weaknesses: A Myling is known to be quieter when hunting
strengths: Mylings more frequently make paranormal sounds

name: Obake
description: Obake are terrifying shape-shifters, capable of taking on many forms. They have been seen taking on humanoid shapes to attract their prey.
weaknesses: Sometimes leaves behind unique evidence
strengths: Rarely leaves a trace when interacting with the environment

name: Oni
description: Onis are a cousin to the Demon and possess extreme strength. There have been rumors that they become more active around their prey.
weaknesses: An Oni's increased activity makes them easier to find
strengths: Increased activity if there are multiple players nearby

name: Onryo
description: The Onryo is often referred to as 'The Wrathful Spirit.' It steals souls from dying victims' bodies to seek revenge. This ghost has been known to fear any form of fire, and will do anything to be far from it.
weaknesses: When threatened, this ghost will be less likely to hunt
strengths: Extinguishing a flame can cause an Onryo to attack

name: Phantom
description: A Phantom is a Ghost that can possess the living, most commonly summoned by a Ouija Board. It also induces fear into those around it.
weaknesses: Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to briefly disappear
strengths: Looking at a Phantom will lower the player's Sanity considerably

name: Poltergeist
description: One of the most famous Ghosts, a Poltergeist, also known as a noisy ghost can manipulate objects around it to spread fear into it's victims.
weaknesses: Becomes powerless with no throwables nearby
strengths: Capable of throwing multiple objects at once

name: Raiju
description: A Raiju is a demon that thrives on electrical current. While generally calm, they can become agitated when overwhelmed with power.
weaknesses: Constantly disrupt electronic equipment
strengths: Moves faster near electrical devices

name: Revenant
description: A Revenant is a slow but violent Ghost that will attack indiscriminantly. It has been rumored to travel at a significantly high speed when hunting.
weaknesses: Without a target, the Revenant moves very slowly
strengths: Can travel significantly faster if a player is spotted during a Hunt

name: Shade
description: A Shade is known to be a Shy Ghost. There is evidence that a Shade will stop all paranormal activity if there are multiple people nearby.
weaknesses: Less likely to hunt if multiple people are nearby
strengths: Being shy makes it more difficult to locate and obtain evidence

name: Spirit
description: A Spirit is the most common Ghost you will come across however it is still very powerful and dangerous. They are usually discovered at one of their hunting grounds after an unexplained death.
weaknesses: Smudge Sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer
strengths: None

name: Thaye
description: A Spirit is the most common Ghost you will come across however it is still very powerful and dangerous. They are usually discovered at one of their hunting grounds after an unexplained death.
weaknesses: Smudge Sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer
strengths: None

name: The Mimic
description: The Mimic is an elusive, mysterious, copycat ghost that mirrors traits and behaviours from others, including other ghost types.
weaknesses: Several reports have noted ghost orb sightings near mimics.
strengths: We're unsure what this ghost is capable of. Be careful.

name: The Twins
description: These ghosts have been reported to mimic each other's actions. They alternate their attacks to confuse their prey.
weaknesses: The Twins will often interact with the environment at the same time
strengths: Either Twin can be angered and initiate an attack on their prey

name: Wraith
description: A Wraith is one of the most dangerous Ghosts you will find. It is also the only known ghost that has the ability of flight and has sometimes been known to travel through walls.
weaknesses: Will become more active if it steps in salt
strengths: Does not leave UV Footprints after stepping in salt

name: Yokai
description: A common type of ghost that is attracted to human voices. They can usually be found haunting family homes.
weaknesses: Can only hear voices close to it during a Hunt
strengths: Talking near the Yokai will anger it, increasing the chance to attack

name: Yurei
description: A Yurei is a Ghost that has returned to the physical world, usually for the purpose of revenge or hatred.
weaknesses: Smudging the Yurei's Ghost Room will reduce how often it wanders
strengths: Has a stronger effect on Sanity
